verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, as he was praying <S%G4336><s%> in a certain <S%G5100><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he ceased, <S%G3973><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of his disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> us to pray, <S%G4336><s%> as John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, When <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Our Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Hallowed <S%G37><s%> be your name. <S%G3686><s%> Your kingdom <S%G932><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%> Your will <S%G2307><s%> be done, <S%G1096><s%> as in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> in earth. <S%G1093><s%>
Give <S%G1325><s%> us day <S%G3588><s%> by day <S%G3588><s%> our daily <S%G1967><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And forgive <S%G863><s%> us our sins; <S%G266><s%> for we also <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that is indebted <S%G3784><s%> to us. And lead <S%G1533><s%> us not into <S%G1519><s%> temptation; <S%G3986><s%> but deliver <S%G4506><s%> us from evil. <S%G4190><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Which <S%G5101><s%> of you shall have <S%G2192><s%> a friend, <S%G5384><s%> and shall go <S%G4198><s%> to him at <S%G3317><s%> midnight, <S%G3317><s%> and say <S%G2036><s%> to him, Friend, <S%G5384><s%> lend <S%G5531><s%> me three <S%G5140><s%> loaves; <S%G740><s%>

For a friend <S%G5384><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> in his journey <S%G3598><s%> is come <S%G3854><s%> to me, and I have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3739><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> him?

And he from within <S%G2081><s%> shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say, <S%G2036><s%> Trouble <S%G2873><s%> me not: the door <S%G2374><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> shut, <S%G2808><s%> and my children <S%G3813><s%> are with me in bed; <S%G2845><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> you.

I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Though <S%G1499><s%> he will not rise <S%G1453><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> him, because <S%G1223><s%> he is his friend, <S%G5384><s%> yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of his importunity <S%G335><s%> he will rise <S%G450><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> him as many <S%G3745><s%> as he needs. <S%G5535><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Ask, <S%G154><s%> and it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you; seek, <S%G2212><s%> and you shall find; <S%G2147><s%> knock, <S%G2925><s%> and it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> to you.
For every <S%G3956><s%> one that asks <S%G154><s%> receives; <S%G2983><s%> and he that seeks <S%G2212><s%> finds; <S%G2147><s%> and to him that knocks <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

If a son <S%G5207><s%> shall ask <S%G154><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> of any <S%G5100><s%> of you that is a father, <S%G3962><s%> will he give <S%G1929><s%> him a stone? <S%G3037><s%> or if he ask a fish, <S%G2486><s%> will he for a fish <S%G2486><s%> give <S%G1929><s%> him a serpent? <S%G3789><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall ask <S%G154><s%> an egg, <S%G5609><s%> will he offer <S%G1929><s%> him a scorpion? <S%G4651><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how to give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gifts <S%G1390><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> children: <S%G5043><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall your <S%G3588><s%> heavenly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3772><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to them that ask <S%G154><s%> him?

And he was casting <S%G1544><s%> out a devil, <S%G1140><s%> and it was dumb. <S%G2974><s%> And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when the devil <S%G1140><s%> was gone <S%G1831><s%> out, the dumb <S%G2974><s%> spoke; <S%G2980><s%> and the people <S%G3793><s%> wondered. <S%G2296><s%>
But some <S%G5100><s%> of them said, <S%G2036><s%> He casts <S%G1544><s%> out devils <S%G1140><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> the chief <S%G758><s%> of the devils. <S%G1140><s%>
And others, <S%G2087><s%> tempting <S%G3985><s%> him, sought <S%G2212><s%> of him a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But he, knowing <S%G1492><s%> their thoughts, <S%G1270><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Every <S%G3956><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> divided <S%G1266><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> is brought <S%G2049><s%> to desolation; <S%G2049><s%> and a house <S%G3624><s%> divided against <S%G1909><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> falls. <S%G4098><s%>

If <S%G1499><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be divided <S%G1266><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall his kingdom <S%G932><s%> stand? <S%G2476><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you say <S%G3004><s%> that I cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils <S%G1140><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub. <S%G954><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> I by Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils, <S%G1140><s%> by whom <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them out? therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> shall they be your <S%G5216><s%> judges. <S%G2923><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> I with the finger <S%G1147><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils, <S%G1140><s%> no <S%G686><s%> doubt <S%G686><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> on you.
When <S%G3752><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> man armed <S%G2528><s%> keeps <S%G5442><s%> his palace, <S%G833><s%> his goods <S%G5224><s%> are in peace: <S%G1515><s%>

But when <S%G1875><s%> a stronger <S%G2478><s%> than he shall come <S%G1904><s%> on him, and overcome <S%G3528><s%> him, he takes <S%G142><s%> from him all <S%G3833><s%> his armor <S%G3833><s%> wherein <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he trusted, <S%G3982><s%> and divides <S%G1239><s%> his spoils. <S%G4661><s%>
He that is not with me is against <S%G2596><s%> me: and he that gathers <S%G4863><s%> not with me scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> out of a man, <S%G444><s%> he walks <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> dry <S%G504><s%> places, <S%G5117><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> rest; <S%G372><s%> and finding <S%G2147><s%> none, <S%G3361><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> I will return <S%G5290><s%> to my house <S%G3624><s%> from where <S%G3606><s%> I came <S%G1831><s%> out.
And when he comes, <S%G2064><s%> he finds <S%G2147><s%> it swept <S%G4563><s%> and garnished. <S%G2885><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> goes <S%G4198><s%> he, and takes <S%G3880><s%> to him seven <S%G2033><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> more wicked <S%G4191><s%> than himself; <S%G1438><s%> and they enter <S%G1525><s%> in, and dwell <S%G2730><s%> there: <S%G1563><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that man <S%G444><s%> is worse <S%G5501><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as he spoke <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, a certain <S%G5100><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> of the company <S%G3793><s%> lifted <S%G1869><s%> up her voice, <S%G5456><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the womb <S%G2836><s%> that bore <S%G941><s%> you, and the breasts <S%G3149><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have sucked. <S%G2337><s%>
But he said, <S%G2036><s%> Yes <S%G3304><s%> rather, <S%G3304><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and keep <S%G5442><s%> it.

And when the people <S%G3793><s%> were gathered <S%G1865><s%> thick together, <S%G1865><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is an evil <S%G4190><s%> generation: <S%G1074><s%> they seek <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> it, but the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Jonas <S%G2495><s%> the prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

For as Jonas <S%G2495><s%> was a sign <S%G4592><s%> to the Ninevites, <S%G3536><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be to this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

The queen <S%G938><s%> of the south <S%G3558><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> up in the judgment <S%G2920><s%> with the men <S%G435><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and condemn <S%G2632><s%> them: for she came <S%G2064><s%> from the utmost <S%G4009><s%> parts of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of Solomon; <S%G4672><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a greater <S%G4119><s%> than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

The men <S%G435><s%> of Nineve <S%G3535><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> up in the judgment <S%G2920><s%> with this <S%G5026><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> it: for they repented <S%G3340><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jonas; <S%G2495><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a greater <S%G4119><s%> than Jonas <S%G2495><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> when he has lighted <S%G681><s%> a candle, <S%G3088><s%> puts <S%G5087><s%> it in a secret <S%G2926><s%> place, neither <S%G3761><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bushel, <S%G3426><s%> but on <S%G1909><s%> a candlestick, <S%G3087><s%> that they which <S%G3588><s%> come <S%G1531><s%> in may see <S%G991><s%> the light. <S%G5338><s%>

The light <S%G3088><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> is the eye: <S%G3788><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G1875><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> is single, <S%G573><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is full <S%G5460><s%> of light; <S%G5460><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> your eye <S%G3788><s%> is evil, <S%G4190><s%> your body <S%G4983><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is full of darkness. <S%G4652><s%>
Take <S%G4648><s%> heed <S%G4648><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that the light <S%G5457><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in you be not darkness. <S%G4655><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> be full <S%G5460><s%> of light, <S%G5460><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3365><s%> <S%G5100><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> dark, <S%G4652><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> shall be full <S%G5460><s%> of light, <S%G5460><s%> as when <S%G3752><s%> the bright <S%G796><s%> shining <S%G796><s%> of a candle <S%G3088><s%> does give <S%G5461><s%> you light. <S%G5461><s%>

And as he spoke, <S%G2980><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> sought <S%G2065><s%> him to dine <S%G709><s%> with him: and he went <S%G1525><s%> in, and sat <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> to meat.
And when the Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he marveled <S%G2296><s%> that he had not first <S%G4412><s%> washed <S%G907><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> dinner. <S%G712><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Now <S%G3568><s%> do you Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> clean <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and the platter; <S%G4094><s%> but your <S%G5216><s%> inward <S%G2081><s%> part is full <S%G1073><s%> of ravening <S%G724><s%> and wickedness. <S%G4189><s%>
You fools, <S%G878><s%> did not he that made <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is without <S%G1855><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> that which is within <S%G2081><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%>
But rather <S%G4133><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> of such things as you have; <S%G1751><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are clean <S%G2513><s%> to you.

But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Pharisees! <S%G5330><s%> for you tithe <S%G586><s%> mint <S%G2238><s%> and rue <S%G4076><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> manner of herbs, <S%G3001><s%> and pass <S%G3928><s%> over <S%G3928><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> and the love <S%G26><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> you to have done, <S%G4160><s%> and not to leave <S%G863><s%> the other <S%G2548><s%> undone.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Pharisees! <S%G5330><s%> for you love <S%G25><s%> the uppermost <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and greetings <S%G783><s%> in the markets. <S%G58><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you are as graves <S%G3419><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> appear <S%G82><s%> not, and the men <S%G444><s%> that walk <S%G4043><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> them are not aware <S%G1492><s%> of them.

Then <S%G1161><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of the lawyers, <S%G3544><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> you reproach <S%G5195><s%> us also. <S%G2532><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you also, <S%G2532><s%> you lawyers! <S%G3544><s%> for you lade <S%G5412><s%> men <S%G444><s%> with burdens <S%G5413><s%> grievous <S%G1418><s%> to be borne, <S%G1418><s%> and you yourselves <S%G846><s%> touch <S%G4379><s%> not the burdens <S%G5413><s%> with one <S%G1520><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> fingers. <S%G1147><s%>
Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you! for you build <S%G3618><s%> the sepulchers <S%G3419><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> them.

Truly <S%G686><s%> you bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> that you allow <S%G4909><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> fathers: <S%G3962><s%> for they indeed <S%G3303><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> them, and you build <S%G3618><s%> their sepulchers. <S%G3419><s%>

Therefore also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> I will send <S%G649><s%> them prophets <S%G4396><s%> and apostles, <S%G652><s%> and some of them they shall slay <S%G615><s%> and persecute: <S%G1559><s%>

That the blood <S%G129><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was shed <S%G1632><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> may be required <S%G1567><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> generation; <S%G1074><s%>

From the blood <S%G129><s%> of Abel <S%G6><s%> to the blood <S%G129><s%> of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> perished <S%G622><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> and the temple: <S%G3624><s%> truly <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, It shall be required <S%G1567><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, lawyers! <S%G3544><s%> for you have taken <S%G142><s%> away the key <S%G2807><s%> of knowledge: <S%G1108><s%> you entered <S%G1525><s%> not in yourselves, <S%G846><s%> and them that were entering <S%G1525><s%> in you hindered. <S%G2967><s%>

And as he said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to them, the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to urge <S%G1758><s%> him vehemently, <S%G1171><s%> and to provoke <S%G653><s%> him to speak <S%G653><s%> of many <S%G4119><s%> things:
Laying <S%G1748><s%> wait <S%G1748><s%> for him, and seeking <S%G2212><s%> to catch <S%G2340><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> out of his mouth, <S%G4750><s%> that they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him.
